channel.title: Need a coder(simple things...)
channel.description:
Ok I need a coder to be able to add these stuff
~Add a ::steeldragon cmd and steeldragons all over with a guy selling fish (steeldragons out in the sun on green grass lol :P ) ~a ::pk area with jad on the side lol(Try making mac hp 200 to everyone) ~A runecraft area(I dunno if I have it) ~A crystalchest(I dunno if I have one already with random items) ~All npcs have drops with crystal keys and other random items ~smithing randoms items(dunno if I have already) ~a ::hightrain and ::wildtrain cmd(dunno if I have already) ~d wep specs ~Lots of shops+npcs
I believe thats it probably will add more
P.s I know I had a development thing I can';t find it no more+ I can't contact my coders...:(
